meanings.definition: Sequestrates (verb): to take legal possession of assets until a debt has been paid
meanings.sent1: The court sequestrates the property until the debt is settled.
meanings.sent2: The bank sequestrates the car when the loan is not repaid.
meanings.sent3: The judge sequestrates the money until the case is resolved.
meanings.sent4: The law sequestrates the funds to ensure payment.
meanings.sent5: The government sequestrates the assets to secure the debt.

meanings.definition: Sequestrates (noun): a person or entity that seizes assets for legal purposes
meanings.sent1: The sequestrates are responsible for securing the assets.
meanings.sent2: The sequestrates ensure the proper handling of seized property.
meanings.sent3: The sequestrates carefully manage the confiscated items.
meanings.sent4: The sequestrates play a crucial role in asset protection.
meanings.sent5: The sequestrates diligently oversee the seized assets.
